backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining prompt, blog, contact, and user-profile types with admin‑gated CRUD operations, access control, and premium filtering logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON placeholder for feature evidence with an empty feature list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML root file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, layout, theme provider, and lazy‑loaded pages.
Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a new user's profile name.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Grid of category cards linking to the library with filtered search.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines prompt categories with labels, descriptions, and icon indices.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders an icon from a sprite sheet based on index.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: Clipboard copy button with feedback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Shows alert messages for form status states including loading, success, and error.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with navigation, theme toggle, auth actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Button to add or remove a prompt from favorites with auth and premium checks.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Card view showing prompt metadata, access controls, copy button, and favorite toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Detailed prompt view with full text, access gating, metadata, and usage instructions.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: Filter UI for searching, categorizing, sorting, and clearing prompt filters.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title and meta description dynamically.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides theme state and syncs selected theme with DOM and localStorage.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Provides a dropdown-based theme switcher allowing users to select light, dark, or system theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Wrapper hook returning the current caller’s user profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Delays updates to a value by a specified time, returning a debounced version.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, handling login state, and providing identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for prompts, favorites, user profiles, and blog posts using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom light/dark theme variables with global styles and scrollbar customization.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Builds blog post URLs from titles and IDs and parses IDs from slugged paths.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Provides utilities to download single or multiple prompts as text files.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Filters prompts based on search text, category, tier, and popularity or recency flags.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Generates URL slugs for prompts and extracts numeric IDs from prompt paths.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validation helpers for email, name, and message fields returning error messages or null.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing PromptFarm AI’s mission, offerings, and quality standards.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Handles login flow, redirecting authenticated users and showing profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading and empty states, using cards and links to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Fetches and renders a single blog post with navigation back to the blog list and handles loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a SEO header and a grid of prompt categories for browsing.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and status messages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard with profile info, favorite prompts, membership tabs, and download options, redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, category previews, and links to explore prompts.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows free and premium membership plans with feature lists and highlights the user's current plan.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Newsletter signup page with email validation, form submission using a subscription hook, status messages, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single prompt's details based on URL params, with loading/error states and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Loads all prompts, applies search and filter logic, and renders a grid of prompt cards with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing PromptFarm AI’s goals, architecture notes, existing features, and versioning.
